page.title: 07THE RIDGEWAY - STREATLEY
page.content:
The Ridgeway runs from Avebury in Wiltshire to Streatley in Berkshire. Then it stops by the river and starts on the other side from Goring in Oxfordshire to Ivinghoe Beacon in Buckinghamshire.
There is quite a lot of traffic on the Ridgeway,eg.Land Rovers,farm machinery etc,as well as people who drop a lot of litter,which is collected at weekends.The ridgeway wardens collect about 1 tonne of litter every weekend.They come out in pairs on Sundays and on Bank Holidays to give information or to collect litter.
There are a number of farms along the Ridgeway so most of the landscape is farmland, both arable and pasture.
